forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 11am and noon, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between noon and 2pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 2pm and 5pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 87. West wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 68. North wind 2 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
In Boston today, the atmosphere carries a muted vibrancy, cloaked in shades of gray with a hint of humidity lingering in the air. A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms weaves through the morning hours, creating an ambience of anticipation. The day promises to warm up, reaching near 87, although the clouds will be reluctant to part completely. With a gentle west wind whispering through the streets, this isn't a day to wear your sunniest attire; opt instead for light layers that can handle brief encounters with rain. 

As the sun edges into the afternoon, expect thick clouds to loom, enhancing the chance of unexpected showers that may dance across the skyline. Tonight brings a subtle shift, offering a brief respite with a low hovering around 68. Yet, there’s still a lingering possibility of light showers, making it a splendid evening to indulge in the simple pleasures of life, perhaps an inviting read on the porch or a casual stroll through the softening streets. Choose wisely, and embrace the beauty woven into this late summer day, where nature’s moods offer a blend of warmth and welcome shade.
